name: Projekt: Lila
overview: In Projekt:Lila you play as the female Cyborgwarrior Lila, which has to fight against a corrupt system. Once part of this system, she has been fallen into disgrace and was declared as public enemy. The reason for this are unclear to her and she wants to learn who is behind this and break some bones. The Game is basically a Homage at the Mega Man series but with a small twist. Lilas Exo-suite has been damaged during her initial escape from the guardians of the high order. Due to this damage she can only shoot when jumping or stay in position.. In order to repair her suite and to get information about who is behind all this she has to collect their logic units called "eBRAIN". Every dead opponent will drop one. The handicap will cause on ore two stressing situations and maybe you destroy an opponent above a hole.. If so you may need to dig further into the level and check where it has landed.
